verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O holy river
Flow into my garden, flow
Soaking, soaking this thirsty ground
Flow, with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with bountiful life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O holy river
Flow into my garden, flow
Leaf by leaf, restoring life
Flow, with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with bountiful life

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O holy river
Flow into my garden, flow
Cleansing, cleansing each hidden place
Flow with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with blessings
From the springs of wisdom
To the shores of righteousness
Flow with bountiful life
O holy river
